roleset.name: make the characteristic noise of a cat, communicating like a cat
roleset.note: MEOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'meow' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38. (from meow.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Kitty
example.text: The kitty meowed when it was hungry.
